title: Pool Party Nasus Skin Concept
body:
For Months I've been asking myself the question; "How has the not already been done."
I mean honestly, we have some pool party skins that are so blatantly simple a three year old could come up with. Zac for example (Just for clarification I absolutely love Zac and his PP skin) his is literally just blue Zac with shorts and a few animations thrown on top, not too much to ride home about. Renekton has had a PP skin since the dawn of time it would seem and since they are rivals and both share a few skins (Galactic, and it may not be the same but Scorched Earth and Infernal are not so different.) and it would be fitting for them both to share a PP skin together. Even all of his MOVES have potential.

Q - Rushing water around the tip of the pool noodle.
W - Instead of having locust and purple pestilence it could be a bluish colour with fish instead.
E - Have either a sprinkler like system similar to Graves OR have the ground crack open into a geyser of some kind.
R - Enlarge Nasus, Put his glasses down and possibly give a bigger pool floaty instead of a noodle?

Whatever the case, I feel like this would be a pretty easy feat and I'm sure people would appreciate it, I know I would definitely buy it.

replies.body: only if it looks like that in game lol
